Summary: look up though I saw 2 very bright stars. first star took off stright up .2ed flowed.
divs: Sighting Detailsmy son and myself were on the deck talking when i saw 2 what i though were vary bright stars.I told my son to look , and the first star took off stright up till it faded, then the other did the same. these were moving not just fadeing out!!
